title: Don’t You Dare Try and Paint All of Islam With the Same Brush
subtitle: Did President Obama throw a tantrum and tell senior Pentagon officials 'don't you dare paint all of Islam with the same brush' during an ISIS briefing?'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: President Obama angrily said “don’t you dare paint all of Islam with the same brush” after becoming agitated that ISIS and Islam had been conflated.
